examples.example: 我和同事们在工作中相互帮助，共同进步。

translate.english: I and my colleagues help each other at work and make progress together.

examples.example: 我的同事都很友善且乐于助人，和他们一起工作特别开心。

translate.english: My colleagues are all very friendly and helpful, and working with them is extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 我的同事总是以积极乐观的态度面对工作，给大家带来了很多正能量。

translate.english: My colleague always faces the work with a positive and optimistic attitude, bringing a lot of positive energy to everyone.
